PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-06462015-05-28,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN
ActNational Energy Board Act
Canadian Environmental Assessment Act
SubjectCertificate of Public Convenience and Necessity GC-124 - NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd.
PrecisOrder directing the National Energy Board to issue a CERTIFICATE OF PUBLIC CONVENIENCE AND NECESSITY GC-124 to NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd. in order to authorize the construction and operation of its Wolverine River Lateral Loop (Carmon Creek Section) Pipeline Project.
